long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in a breathtaking cosmic landscape every time you open a new tab with this stunning background. Featuring a serene alien planet under a starry sky with a luminous moon reflecting over calm waters, this extension transports you to a peaceful, otherworldly setting. Perfect for those who love space and the mysteries of the universe, this background will inspire awe and wonder, making your browsing experience more relaxing and visually captivating.
